au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.jpathplan.entites

Class Plan

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.jpathplan.entites.Plan
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputedPlan

    public abstract class Plan
extends Object
    This is an interface which defines the basic requriements of the path returned by any path planning algorithm such that the client application can easily extract the information in the format it understands. Any class implementing this interface should be immutable once returned by the planning algorithm, such that client applications are not able to modify it once a path has been found and created.
    Author:
    Abhijeet Anand (abhijeet [dot] anand [at] rmit [dot] edu [dot] au)

      • resetSteps

        public abstract boolean resetSteps()
        Reset the pointer to the current step to the beginning of the path, such that the next call to getNextStep returns Nodes from the beginning of the path.
        Returns:
        true if the iterator on this path was successfully reset to the start;
        false otherwise.
